CustomField.formula:
OR( $Permission.Can_Edit_All_Opportunity_Stages, IF( AND( $Permission.Can_Edit_Legal_Opportunity_Stages, OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Compliance"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Contract"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Homologation") ) ), true, false ), IF( AND( $Permission.Can_Edit_NB_Management_Opportunity_Stages, OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Compliance"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Contract"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Homologation") ) ), true, false ), IF( AND( $Permission.Can_Edit_Sales_Management_Opportunity_Stages, OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Discovery"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiation") ) ), true, false ), IF( AND( $Permission.Can_Edit_New_Business_Management_Opportunity_Stages, OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Discovery") ) ), true, false ), IF( AND( $Permission.Can_Edit_New_Opportunity_Sales, TODAY() <= (DATEVALUE(Account.CreatedDate) + 180)
), true, false ) )
CustomField.label: Can Edit Opportunity Fields
